column1: To reduce expenditure, I consider using smaller EC2 instance type, reducing amount of disk of database backups and cutting off resources for CloudFront. With these changes, I can expect that the latency will be higher but in acceptable range, I get a significant reduction in payment thought.

column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
